title: shavebob77
author: shavebob77
created_time: June 19, 2022, 10:02:38 PMLast edit: November 07, 2022, 04:58:30 PM by shavebob77

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: shavebob77 on June 19, 2022, 10:02:38 PMI need some personal guidance as a beginner in forex and other type of trading and would like some basic stuff answered throughout the day,i know 10$ its not much but I'm also not asking for a deep dive course explanation for that price too i understand (unless you would like to help on that level for that price) if interested please contact me on telegram for more details,thanks ; ) . telegram = haverclint67I would rather advise you to do your own personal research about things you don't understand. Trading skills cannot be learned overnight, and no one can give you a magic formula for how to be successful. You are right, $10 is not a serious amount and you will hardly attract any experienced trader who will be encouraged to help you and explain something. it is more of a call for savvy traders and those who know a little but overestimate their knowledge. you will agree with me that such traders are not the best source for learning.if you make a little effort yourself and start to understand the concepts, you will come to know more precisely what interests you and you will ask more precise questions. if you ask such questions here, you are more likely to get quality answers, even for free.So, start to learn through your own research and ask here (surely there are still plenty of forums dedicated to forex) what you don't understand.what you also need to know, cryptocurrency trading as well as services dedicated to it are significantly different from forex trading. everything looks very similar, but there are significant differences. but you can find out for yourself. or not?

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: You would either get scammed by the members that may pm you, or your will lose your money as you try to trade, or the both will happen, many members have said it on this forum that if you are asking how to trade or if you are a newbie, then you should not trade, you might be thinking some great profits awaits you as you begin trading, i am sorry it isn't always positive, learn other necessary things about cryptocurrencies and bitcoin, then add trading later on if you still care.You might want to be extra careful with the PM's you'd be receiving right after this thread.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I will advice you to learn on your own, if we can do it, you can do it too. Be careful of paid trading signals, paid bots and copy trading, learn trading from scratch yourself and use the amount of money you can afford to lose for it. Know one thing, that new traders are always lose, even lower the amount you can afford to lose, just use small part like $10 to be learning trading. Quote from: Z-tight on June 19, 2022, 10:52:33 PMYou might want to be extra careful with the PM's you'd be receiving right after this thread.This is how some people are easily scammed, a user can just send him pm, demand for more money and scam him easily.

comments.author: Text
comments.created_time: June 20, 2022, 11:32:17 PMLast edit: June 20, 2022, 11:45:55 PM by Text
comments.body: Binance has this product of educational program (Binance Academy) this can help you to acquire and learn basic knowledge. They have these guides and courses about crypto and blockchain, of course, they have trading content for being the largest crypto exchange in the world.The site is publicly accessible, even you are logged in or not.Trading articles:What is Forex Trading?How To Trade Responsibly?What is a spot market and how to do spot trading?A Beginner's Guide to TradingViewYou can still have your other resources as a preference, DYOR (Do Your Own Research)

comments.body: Quote from: int03h on June 21, 2022, 12:31:29 AMQuote from: shavebob77 on June 19, 2022, 10:02:38 PMI need some personal guidance as a beginner in forex and other type of trading and would like some basic stuff answered throughout the day,i know 10$ its not much but I'm also not asking for a deep dive course explanation for that price too i understand (unless you would like to help on that level for that price) if interested please contact me on telegram for more details,thanks ; ) . telegram = haverclint67you can join tradingview, tradingview is open for all,beginner level it is a great tool to learn all kinds of online trading. many trader shares their own view, you can use that for learning purpose.Trading view is just a tool, and if you install trading view it won't be any useful for you unless to have a complete training about it.Many people are suggesting OP to learn freely from the internet and youtube videos, which is a good idea but some people prefer a teacher who can teach them properly and address their queries.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: You want to day trade or swing trade? I'd advise against day trading. It's extremely exhausting and sometimes you'll feel like you had 2 good days and then a bad day wiped it all out and you realize that you spent 3 days doing nothing, just wasting your time. That's especially if you try to day trade crypto. There are people and bots who make money of day traders by doing what you're trying to do just with much more money and much faster reaction time. Rather than day trading try to identify general trends and do monthly or yearly trades. You'll do much better. Most rich traders started as day traders and as they had more and more money their perspective became longer. It was no longer about making that $100 a day from 50 trades but making 5k a month from 1 trade.

If you could find the right person who can make you successful consistently by simply telling you the right time to buy, will you be willing to share part of your profits with such person if you succeed all the time with zero risk? If yes, then let me know on this thread.

comments.author: popeye95
comments.body: With 10 dollars per day, you should just use it as your test fund and start trading. It's okay, not everyone becomes an expert in trading in a matter of a day. Start trading with that 10 dollars and slowly learn the rope, if you see and roadblock, you can search for it online since the most common cases are well-documented. Else, you can head over to the trading section and make a thread, asking for advice.
